data.text:
Health care in Colorado is in crisis. Costs are crushing families and straining our budget. 

As governor, I’ll launch a first-ever Colorado public option so working people can get quality coverage they can afford.

🔗 https://t.co/n54FYUUHwt https://t.co/giwViJoXth

Today I’m rolling out a cornerstone of my campaign: a plan to transform our health care system with a Colorado public option.

I’m running for governor to take on health care costs and make quality coverage affordable for working Coloradans. https://t.co/hCtXY1BlN5

We need real limits, real oversight, and real consequences for Constitutional violations.

And that starts with new leadership: Kristi Noem and Stephen Miller need to go. https://t.co/jPsN9KU10f
